com.axibase.tsd.model.portal.PortalConfi.name: MySQL
com.axibase.tsd.model.portal.PortalConfi.content:
[configuration] title = MySQL Server Perfomance Portal height-units = 3 width-units = 5 step-line = false markers = false entity = ${entity} timespan = 1 day
[group] [widget] type = chart title = Connections per hour tooltip = Connection to MySQL database per hour markers = true statistics = counter period = 1 hour [series] metric = mysql.global_status.connections
[widget] type = chart title = InnoDB Buffer Pool Requests tooltip = Request timespan = 2 hour label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, 'pool_') statistics = counter period = 10 minute [series] metric = mysql.global_status.innodb_buffer_pool_read_requests [series] metric = mysql.global_status.innodb_buffer_pool_write_requests
[widget] type = chart title = Threads tooltip = Threads by type label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '_') min-range = 0 [series] metric = mysql.global_status.threads_cached [series] metric = mysql.global_status.threads_connected [series] metric = mysql.global_status.threads_created [series] metric = mysql.global_status.threads_running
[widget] type = bar title = Created temporary objects tooltip = Created temporary objects stack = false timespan = 15 minute format = decimal(0) label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '.') [column] [series] metric = mysql.global_status.created_tmp_disk_tables group label = disk_tables [series] metric = mysql.global_status.created_tmp_files group label = files [series] metric = mysqlmysql.global_status.created_tmp_tables group label = tables
[widget] type = chart title = Handler read first timespan = 3 hour tooltip = Handler read first markers = true statistics = counter period = 15 minute [series] metric = mysql.global_status.handler_read_first
[group] [widget] type = chart title = Bytes received/sent tooltip = Bytes received/sent mode = column format = bytes timespan = 12 hour statistics = counter period = 30 minute label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '.') [series] metric = mysql.global_status.bytes_received [series] metric = mysql.global_status.bytes_sent
[widget] type = text title = Uptime tooltip = Uptime circle = true format = intervalFormat('%dd %Hh')(value*1000) label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '.') [series] metric = mysql.global_status.uptime
[widget] type = text title = Max used connections tooltip = Max used connections circle = true format = decimal(0) label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '_') [series] metric = mysql.global_status.max_used_connections
[widget] type = text title = Buffer wait free tooltip = Buffer wait free circle = true format = decimal(0) [series] metric = mysql.global_status.innodb_buffer_pool_wait_free label = times
[widget] type = bar title = Open objects tooltip = Open objects timespan = 1 hour alert-style = fill: red; stroke: red horizontal = true label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, 'open_') [column] group label = files label = files [series] metric = mysql.global_status.open_files [column] group label = streams label = streams [series] metric = mysql.global_status.open_streams [column] group label = table_defenitions label = table_defenitions [series] metric = mysql.global_status.open_table_definitions [column] group label = open_tables label = open_tables [series] metric = mysql.global_status.open_tables
[group] [widget] type = chart title = Queries per 10 minutes tooltip = Queries per 10 minutes min-range = 0 timespan = 6 hour statistics = counter period = 10 minute label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '.') [series] metric = mysql.global_status.queries style = fill-opacity: .4
[widget] type = chart title = Select Queries tooltip = Select queries by type per hour timespan = 5 hour label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, 'select_') statistic = counter period = 1 hour [series] metric = mysql.global_status.select_full_range_join [series] metric = mysql.global_status.select_range [series] metric = mysql.global_status.select_range_check [series] metric = mysql.global_status.select_full_join
[widget] type = chart title = Sort Queries tooltip = Sort queries by type per hour timespan = 5 hour label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, 'sort_') thresholds = 0, 100, 500 ,1000, 2000, 3000 color-range = blue period = 1 hour statistic = counter [series] metric = mysql.global_status.sort_merge_passes [series] metric = mysql.global_status.sort_range [series] metric = mysql.global_status.sort_rows [series] metric = mysql.global_status.sort_scan
[widget] type = chart title = Slow queries per hour tooltip = Slow queries per hour markers = true label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '.') statistics = counter period = 1 hour [series] metric = mysql.global_status.slow_queries
[widget] type = chart title = Key reads tooltip = Key reads timespan = 7 day label-format = javascript:keepAfterLast(metric, '.') markers = true statistics = counter period = 6 hour [series] metric = mysql.global_status.key_reads [series] axis = right metric = mysql.global_status.key_read_requests
